Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Not only had I an excellent red curry, but the staff was so nice: I will come back only for you guys!! :))

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Fantastic place. Foods brilliant. Great host. Never miss it when I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Delectable thai cuisine! The staff is extremely client oriented, they offer a customer service BEYOND perfect (my son dropped my spoon on the floor and by the time i went down to retrieve it, the waitress already had brought me a new one).

Name: Na Siam
Review Text:
Had a lovey meal here yesterday.  Very knowledgeable staff on gluten free options.
Great food too.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Great neighbourhood Thai. Very friendly owners with really really good food at reasonable prices.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: The food is delicious, and the owners are very welcoming and hospitable.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: My favorite place for Thai food in Amsterdam. Try paneng nuea or the pla sam rod. Say hi to the owners and cooks. Some of the nicest people you will find.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Wonderfull great small Thai restaurant. Owned by Dutch/Thai couple. Authentic Thai cooking with as far as we can tell only Thai in their kitchen. ‚Ä¶

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: the best Thai food i had in Amsterdam. Ask the owner for Jungle Curry, it is not officially on the menu but if you convince him you are able to eat spicy, his wonderful wife will cook it for you. Very good prices, chilled atmosphere, great Singha beer in stock.... what more to expect? üòÄ

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Super friendly. Food 10/10. I had pad krapao and it was like in Thailand.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: I've been here a few times, and this is definitely my favourite Thai restaurant in Amsterdam. Besides the warm and nice environment, the food is authentic and amazing, they use fresh ingredients (best Tom Kha Kai and Pad Thai ever). The service is great and very friendly!!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: So delicious and it's definitely worth going there, even if you're only doing pick-up. It's nice atmosphere and the owners are lovely!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Not sure what the bar is for good Thai food in Amsterdam, but it was much better than any Thai place I've been to in North America. Nice little hidden gem!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Best Thai restaurant by far in Amsterdam and potentially beyond!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: The food was good an the price was ok. The warm noodle salat with shirmps and chicken was really good, a little bit spicy but not too much. The wine was good, we drank a south african merlot that went really well with the psicy food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Friendly staff. But the food wasn‚Äôt very tasty.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: We chose Na Siam by chance as we were staying close by. It was a lucky choice and we had the Old Siam set menu.  The food and service were both excellent.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Great service. Lovely food. Personal favourite for the last 10 years. Go and have dinner here. Prices are very reasonable!!!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text:
the foods was just alright and not a big potion for what they charge. Not cheap for a dish.
Order 3 dishes and the fish siah was ok but massaman curry
and squid wasn't not really good. Disappointed!

Name: Na Siam
Review Text:
Best Thai place in The Netherlands!
We loved it! Highly recommended

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Good and straight forward Thai food  in a no nonsense but very Amsterdam atmosphere

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Delicious food and friendly service but a slowly paced meal. Good if you can take your time.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Food was good, perhaps a bit bland. I wish my red curry would have had some vegetables also. They have a high chair for babies.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Very nice and intimite Thai restaurant, good food, friendly owners

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Food is not very good compared to other Thai restaurants in Amsterdam. Not enough spices and pepper.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Unfortunately, I was very disappointed. Chicken as starter was hard and tasteless, and the inkvis as main was overcooked and totally bland.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Tasty food, but it's not my favorite Thai place in Amsterdam

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Good tasting meal with good service. I‚Äôd recommend it and would come back.

Name: Na Siam

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Yet to find a better Thai in Amsterdam. Consistently excellent for 15 years.

Name: Na Siam
Review Text: Great food and service

Name: Na Siam
